octavia_load_balancer_listeners_descript: Each Load Balancer receives traffic on one or more listeners. Each listener is characterized by a unique port/protocol pair.
This interface offers the most popular options. Additional options are available via Horizon.
octavia_load_balancer_listeners_default_: The default pool is used for L3/L4 load balancing.
octavia_load_balancer_listeners_protocol: Protocol for which the front-end listens for connections.
octavia_load_balancer_listeners_port_hel: The port on which the front-end listens, must be between 1 and 65535.
octavia_load_balancer_listeners_create_s: The new {{ listener }} listener has been created!
octavia_load_balancer_listeners_edit_suc: The {{ listener }} listener has been updated!
octavia_load_balancer_listener_delete_su: Your {{ listener }} listener has been deleted.
